constantValues: Person or group associated with an activity. An activity can have multiple activity parties.

definitions.description: Person or group associated with an activity. An activity can have multiple activity parties.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the activity associated with the activity party. (A "party" is any person who is associated with an activity.)

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the activity associated with the activity party. (A "party" is any person who is associated with an activity.)

members.name: participationTypeMask

constantValues: Information about whether to allow sending faxes to the activity party.
